charges.charge_description: On or about January 30, 2013, in Jackson County, in the Western District of Missouri, the defendant MARSHALL D. JACKSON, having previously been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in and affecting commerce, a firearm, to wit: a Taurus PP145 .45 caliber semi-auto handgun, a Ruger P90 .45 caliber semi-auto handgun, a Jennings Super X .22 Caliber semi-auto handgun and a Jiminez Arms, Model 9mm semi-auto, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2).
